items.title: P-Chain Transaction Format
items.description: This page is an overview of the transaction format associated with Luxd P-Chain API.

items.title: Platform Chain API
items.description: This page is an overview of the P-Chain API associated with Luxd.

items.title: The Primary Network
items.description: Lux features 3 built-in blockchains which includes Exchange Chain (X-Chain), Platform Chain (P-Chain), and Contract Chain (C-Chain). More info here.
